item.title: Exclusive: Rutgers University Spent $10 Million On DEI Staff In One Year
item.description: Programs run by Rutgers are exactly the kind that the Trump administration has highlighted in its threat to defund left-wing schools.

item.description: America First Policy Institute accuses Madison and other cities of breaking early voting law ahead of huge Wisconsin Supreme Court election.

item.title: Why SCOTUS Should Nuke ‘No-Speech Zones’ Once And For All
item.description: The future of our First Amendment liberties and the lives of countless women and children depend on the Supreme Court overturning Hill v. Colorado .
